{{monster info|naga}}

==Useful Info==
'''Nagas''' are a race of cruel snakemen who dwell in the [[Snake Pit]], usually travelling in packs. They move slowly and wear little armour, but carry heavy weapons and can spit [[poison]] at you. When in melee, they also tend to [[constrict]] you, dealing surprising amounts of damage.

{{monster spells|naga}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*All nagas pack powerful poisonous attacks, making [[poison resistance]] tremendously useful. They also deal significant amounts of physical damage (even the mages), so heavy armour and high [[AC]] helps too. 
*Although nagas will eventually charge you in melee, they will happily spit poison at you repeatedly on the way. Expect to take damage at any range.
*Basic nagas are far less threatening than their specialized brethren. Focus your attention on bigger threats first.
